server.backend.wrapper

Class UserRegistryAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.backend.wrapper.UserRegistryAPI

  • public class UserRegistryAPI
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class UserRegistryAPI is a wrapper class of the User Registry class and defines an API to interact with the server backend.

      • addUtente

        public void addUtente(Utente newUtente)
               throws InvalidUsernameException,
                      InvalidEmailException
        Adds an user to set of registered users and inserts him to the database.
        Parameters:
        newUtente - the new user to add
        Throws:
        InvalidUsernameException - the invalid username exception, username of the new user already exists
        InvalidEmailException - the invalid email exception, email of the new user already exists

      • removeUtente

        public boolean removeUtente(java.lang.String username)
                     throws InvalidUsernameException
        Removes an user, specified by his username, from set of registered users and deletes him from the database.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the user to remove
        Returns:
        true, if successful
        Throws:
        InvalidUsernameException - the invalid username exception, username doesn't exist in the set of registered usernames

      • addPosizione

        public void addPosizione(Posizione newPosizione)
                  throws InvalidUsernameException,
                         InvalidPositionException
        Adds a user position to set of positions of its user and inserts it to the database.*
        Parameters:
        newPosizione - the new position to add
        Throws:
        InvalidUsernameException - the invalid username exception, username doesn't exist
        InvalidPositionException - the invalid position exception, position already exists

      • removePosizione

        public boolean removePosizione(IdPosizione idPosizione)
                        throws InvalidPositionException
        Removes a user position, specified by its id, from set of positions of its user and deletes him from the database.
        Parameters:
        idPosizione - the id posizione
        Returns:
        true, if successful
        Throws:
        InvalidPositionException - the invalid position exception, position doesn't exist

        Returns:
        true, if successful
        Throws:

      • getPosizioniUtenteByData

        public java.util.Set<Posizione> getPosizioniUtenteByData(java.lang.String username,
                                                         java.sql.Timestamp from,
                                                         java.sql.Timestamp to)
                                                  throws InvalidUsernameException,
                                                         InvalidDateException
        Gets all positions of an user, specified by his username, added in a range defined by an initial date and a final date.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the user
        from - initial date of the range
        to - final date of the range
        Returns:
        posizioni all position of the user in the specified range
        Throws:
        InvalidUsernameException - the invalid username exception, username doesn't exist
        InvalidDateException - the invalid date exception, incorrect values of the dates
